file_intent: Product catalog service with CRUD, search, and caching

responsibility_blocks.description: Fetch by id with cache lookup and cache warm-up on miss; cache invalidation on update/delete; cache for categories
responsibility_blocks.label: Cache-enabled read path

responsibility_blocks.description: Input validation for price on create/update; raise domain-specific errors (ProductNotFoundError, InvalidPriceError)
responsibility_blocks.label: Validation and error handling

responsibility_blocks.description: CRUD operations against the database: find, insert, update, delete; include search with filters and pagination
responsibility_blocks.label: Persistence operations

responsibility_blocks.description: Defines Product, CreateProductInput, UpdateProductInput, ProductQuery interfaces for type safety
responsibility_blocks.label: Domain models and inputs
